overview: One day……. Arles was defeated and depressed by the Puyo Puyo game against Satan, the founder of Puyo Hell. Then, Carbuncle is guided by something and disappears into the forest. When Arles is worried, "There was Puyo Puyo of a color that I had never seen before. "If I could touch the eagle, I would grant any wish." What is the identity of Puyo Puyo?
title: Puyo Puyo On Stage
